activities: MedQIA receives de-identified medical data for image analysis as part of clinical trials. Thus MedQIA does not receive any personal information, however it requires written assurances from sites sending data for analysis that they are meeting requirements consistent with Safe Harbor Principles. MedQIA itself adheres to all Safe Harbor Principles.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: MedQIA complies with HIPAA regulations and all projects are approved by the UCLA Institutional Review Board (IRB) for protection of human subjects and personal information.
